pageContext.claim: “We have fought to secure our border, but Democrats in Congress -- Nancy Pelosi, Schumer -- they've opposed us at every stop and every step. They've opposed every effort to close the loopholes to keep the violent criminals like MS-13 the hell out of our country and to stop the flow of illegal immigrants and drugs which are pouring into our country.”
pageContext.analysis: Democrats were willing to agree to full funding of Trump's border wall if he agreed to a path for citizenship for people who qualified for DACA, or Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals, which Trump had terminated. (His action has been blocked in the courts.) But Trump also insisted on restrictions on legal immigration.
